text:
Hey, look at me! I am a tall clown.
Yeah!

A tall clown. That was lucky. Hey, what´s
going on? Oh look! Another poster for the

circus. Let´s go and have a look.
Maggie: Yeah!

Wow! Look at these clowns. Oh, look at this
clown.

Yeah! This one?
Yeah. Is it a tall clown?

Both: No.
It´s a short clown. So come on say it with

me. What is it? It´s a short clown. That´s
right. It´s a short clown. And again. Come

on.
Both: It´s a short clown.

But come on, let´s go to the circus. We´re
going to the circus.

Maggie: Abracadabra!
Hey, look at me. I am a short clown.
